data.author: ruess
data.message:
Merge branch 'enable_reset_button_only_for_rc_visard' into 'master'

* "Reset rc_visard" button is disabled if not-rc_visard is selected in table
* "Reset" context menu entry is not shown if not-rc_visard is selected

Meaning that if you do a discovery, and no device is found, all buttons are enabled. If you find only an rc_cube, and do not click on it, it's still enabled. If you click on the rc_cube, it will be disabled.

See merge request software/rcdiscover!11

Merge branch 'separate_debs' into 'master'

split debian package into commandline and gui packages

Closes SW-214

See merge request software/rcdiscover!2

data.author: Felix Ruess
data.message:
split debian package into commandline and gui packages

so we don't need to install all the X dependencies when we only need the cmdline tool

- building package without extra cmake options builds one debian package with everything
- building package with -DRCDISCOVER_CLI_ONLY_DEB=ON builds rcdiscover package only with cmdline tool
- building package with -DRCDISCOVER_GUI_ONLY_DEB=ON will build the rcdiscover-gui deb which recommends rcdiscover-cli

On our CI we build the `rcdiscover-cli` package with only the cmdline tool and the `rcdiscover-gui` package

closes SW-214
